The croque monsieur is a baked or fried boiled ham and cheese sandwich. The 
dish originated in French cafs and bars as a quick snack. A Croque Madame is 
a version of the dish topped with a fried egg. ... Similarly, in the United Kingdom a 
ham and cheese hot snack is called a 'toastie', and toastie makers are available...
